languages.text: "А вы так ничего и не усвоили, поддавшись малодушию и страху".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "А вы так ничего и не усвоили, поддавшись малодушию и страху". {n}Под прицелом цепких глаз Ардженты тюремщик силится что-то ответить, но преуспевает лишь в мычании.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
languages.original_text: "А вы так ничего и не усвоили, поддавшись малодушию и страху".

traits.locale_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
"And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
"And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
"And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
"And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."
"And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

languages.text: "Und Ihr habt nichts gelernt, watet stattdessen weiterhin in Feigheit."
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr habt nichts gelernt, watet stattdessen weiterhin in Feigheit."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez donc rien appris et choisissez de vous complaire dans votre lâcheté, une fois encore. »
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez donc rien appris et choisissez de vous complaire dans votre lâcheté, une fois encore. »

languages.text: “而你什么都没有学到，反而选择在懦弱中沉沦。”
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: “而你什么都没有学到，反而选择在懦弱中沉沦。”

languages.text: «Y, en lugar de aprender algo, ha decidido consumirse en la cobardía».
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: «Y, en lugar de aprender algo, ha decidido consumirse en la cobardía».

languages.text: 「そしてあなたは何も学ばず、臆病さに浸ることを選んだのだ」
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてあなたは何も学ばず、臆病さに浸ることを選んだのだ」

languages.text: "Sen de hiçbir şey öğrenmedin, bunun yerine korkaklık içinde yaşamayı seçtin."
languages.original_text: "And you have learned nothing, choosing instead to wallow in cowardice."

traits.locale_text: "Sen de hiçbir şey öğrenmedin, bunun yerine korkaklık içinde yaşamayı seçtin."
